title: Time For a Bath
description: An interactive environment that allows children to move, play and get dirty, as any mess can be cleaned up with a bath before bed.
author: Phillis Gershator
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kgOjGxdxW6E

content.caption: Fantland, Fantasy Land, is a village in a forest. User will take on the role of villagers and experience various daily activities in Fantland.
A circular room in two level, developed into three parts with uneven ground that slope upward.
Overall floor plan of forest area, which using high-definition projectors, surround sound and network motion tracking sensors.
The first interaction when user go in, which also hint them that they can do whatever they want in the room.
User can play around in the grassland area, river (water area) or grass.
Trees are projected on the wall, which will have a different corresponding reactions when user touch different positions.
User can play around in the farmland area, also with real object.
Oversize real object for user to chop the tress.
Oversized real objects for user to play with everywhere in the forest.
Time for a bath. Bathroom area with the fragrance of body wash and squirting bubbles.
Two choices for user to go down to the bathtub, slide or stairs.
